entries.player_sorry_3: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_sorry_2: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_sorry_1: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_3: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_reset_2: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_reset_1: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.npc_reset_3: Come back when you think you're ready to see this all the way through.
entries.npc_rest_2: Come back when you think you're ready to see this all the way through.
entries.npc_reset_1: Come back when you think you're ready to see this all the way through.
entries.waypoint_description_2: Locate and free the kidnapped miner.
entries.waypoint_description_1: Deliver the datadisc to the Imperial courier.
entries.return_waypoint_description_2: Escort the miner safely to Kelvus Naria
entries.return_waypoint_description_1: Return to Kelvus Naria and tell him you've completed your assignment.
entries.player_sorry: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_3_2: Do you know who took your assistant?
entries.otherescort_2: You don't want to be here. It's too dangerous.
entries.npc_work_2: Is everything proceeding according to plan for that rescue?
entries.npc_work_1: Have you delivered those records yet?
entries.npc_takeme_2: Kelvus sent you to rescue me? What a relief, I thought I was a goner for sure.
entries.npc_smuggle_1: I'll see that the commander gets this straight away.
entries.npc_reward_2: I don't know how to thank you. Words are inadequate.
entries.npc_reward_1: Thanks for taking care of that. Maybe my people will get treated a little better now.
entries.npc_reset: Come back when you think you're ready to see this all the way through.
entries.npc_noloc_2: Something seems to be jamming my assistant's locater device. Come back in a few minutes, I'll see if I can get someone to boost signal strength.
entries.npc_noloc_1: I need to contact the commander and see where you'll be meeting his courier. Come back and see me in a little while.
entries.npc_failure_2: I know you tried your best. Don't feel too bad.
entries.npc_failure_1: I guess somebody doesn't want the truth to come out. I'm sure you tried your best.
entries.npc_dropoff_2: Thanks for saving me from those lowlifes.
entries.npc_breech_1: Do you have a delivery for Commander Lytus?
entries.npc_backtowork_2: I wish I had more for you to go on but I'm afraid that's it.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Was there something you needed to say to me?
entries.npc_4_2: I'm not certain but I have a sneaking suspicion that the Corporate Sector Authority is involved somehow. They're a lot more concerned with credits than they are with people. Can you help me?
entries.npc_4_1: Commander Lytus has actually expressed an interest in finding out the truth about what goes on at this operation. I need someone to deliver these reports to his courier. He'll be pretty shocked at the discrepancy between these and the ones that were filed officially. Interested?
entries.npc_3_2: No matter what I do, somebody will die.
entries.npc_3_1: Oh well, I'll find someone else then.
entries.npc_2_2: I'm very grateful. All of my workers are outfitted with a locating device in case of trouble during a mining operation. This should aid you in locating the kidnappers. Be very careful, I don't want anyone getting killed who didn't start this.
entries.npc_2_1: Deliver these reports to the commander's courier and be careful. Not everyone wants the commander to see just how much skimming goes on.
entries.npc_1_2: I hope you can help me. Someone trying to force me to vote against tighter safety regulations has kidnapped my subordinate. I don't want to risk my people with lax safety standards, but I don't want my assistant killed either. Would you be willing to try a rescue?
entries.npc_1_1: The Empire is a rough place to be a miner. I try to look after my people but corruption runs rampant and most officials are a lot more concerned with the numbers making them look good than they are with making the numbers worth anything. Sorry, I tend to get a bit caught up. Are you looking for work by any chance?
entries.next: I can't thank you enough for the help you've given me. Come back and see me again soon, maybe I'll have more work for you.
entries.gotowork_1: You didn't lose the package did you?
entries.dontknowyou_2: You don't want to be here. It's too dangerous.
entries.dontknowyou_1: I'm just waiting for a delivery, citizen. You can go on your way. I'll be just fine.
entries.cant_work: I can use a little help with something. When you've got some free time, come back and see me.
